summary: A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.
cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo|Michel Boujenah|Alessandra Martines|Salomé Lelouch|Annie Girardot|Philippe Léotard|Clémentine Célarié|Philippe Khorsand|Ticky Holgado|Rufus|Nicole Croisille|William Leymergie|Jean Marais|Micheline Presle|Darry Cowl|Daniel Toscan du Plantier|Antoine Duléry|Jacques Gamblin|Pierre Vernier|Sylvie Joly|Robert Hossein|Cyrielle Clair|Margot Abascal|Paul Belmondo|Jacques Bonnot|Jacques Boudet|Marie Bunel|Mickael Bussinger|Nathalie Cerda|Michaël Cohen|Jean-François Dérec|Max Fournel|Valerio Gamberini|Pierre-Alexis Hollenbeck|Maurice Mons|Anne-Marie Pisani|Wolfgang Pissors|Isabelle Sadoyan|Marie-France Santon|Pierre Semmler|Guillaume Souchet|Nicolas Vogel|Maurice Auzel|Jean-Claude Bouillaud|Rémy Carpentier|Jean-Philippe Chatrier|Michel Deligne|Gilles Détroit|Gilles Dimicelli|Maryline Even|Stéphane Ferrara|Aldo Frank|Ariane Gardel|Allen Hoist|Henri-Jacques Huet|Bernard Lincot|Joseph Malerba|Jacques Marty|Hugues Massignat|Olivier Mazoyer|Natty Belmondo|Mario Pecqueur|Marcel Pigou|Sabaya|Sachka|Richard Sammel|Simon Sportich|Ricardo Stein|Emmanuel Subes|Arlette Thomas|Lou Tordjman|Thierry Triveillot|Jean-Michel Verner|Jürgen Zwingel|Rémi Bergman|Pascal Guillemin
title: Testigo de excepción
